items.title: You don’t need to have fun at work—take it from NBA head coach Joe Mazzulla: ‘Fun is a cop-out sometimes when things aren’t going well’
items.description: The famously intense Mazzulla was fielding a question about "fun" from a child reporter: "I struggle with that, to be honest with you."
